projects.name: Beach resort react
projects.shortDescription: A hotel reservation website created using React.js.

projects.name: Mock Website
projects.shortDescription: A mock website showcasing login/signup forms, pinterest like gallery, amazon like e-commerce showcase and about me page.
projects.description: A mock website showcasing login/signup forms, pinterest like gallery, amazon like e-commerce showcase and about me page.

projects.name: Github nostalgia
projects.shortDescription: Chrome extension to modify GitHub profile dom.
projects.description: Chrome extension to modify GitHub profile dom. This extension will customize GitHub to look similar to the old design. Also added ability to auto format the url of a currently playing YouTube video and display with current timestamp that you are on

projects.name: Meme Generator
projects.shortDescription: A basic meme generator using react and random images.
projects.description: A basic meme generator which takes top and bottom text and overlays it above a random meme image taken from meme generator api.

projects.name: Shopping cart flutter
projects.shortDescription: A basic shopping cart application built with flutter
projects.description: A basic shopping cart application built with flutter with barcode scanning function to add items to cart, credit card info screen. This app uses basic static github api as previous api was deprecated, retaining all previous logic

projects.name: To-Do App
projects.shortDescription: A basic todo web app using introductory React
projects.description: A basic todo web app using introductory React
